treasure.name: automaticCrossbow
treasure.description: A crossbow which continuously fires bolts so long as the trigger is held.

treasure.name: romanCandle
treasure.description: A wand-like object that emits a ball of greek fire when evoked.

treasure.name: phoenixBearMace
treasure.description: An aluminum cylinder covered in warning labels. A firey blue growling bear face is plastard on the front. 'Keep Away from Eyes'

treasure.name: bananaPeel
treasure.description: The peel of a banana, it's insides seem unusually slippery.

treasure.name: handheldVacuumCleaner
treasure.description: Small but powerful little vacuum that runs on batteries.

treasure.name: banefulButterknife
treasure.description: A tiny blade that glints wickedly in the light.  Sharp enough to cut through anything like butter.  Watch your fingers!

treasure.name: cattleProd
treasure.description: A thin black cylinder with two metal prongs sticking out of one end. Perfect for dealing with shapeshifters and mimics.
